title: Châteaux & Hôtels Collection expands in the UK
text:
Châteaux & Hôtels Collection expands in the UK Châteaux & Hôtels Collection expands in the UK Details Category: Hotel   11:45 Châteaux & Hôtels Collection, presided over by Alain Ducasse, has welcomed a new UK member to its collection of charming boutique properties. Headlam Hall, Country Hotel & Spa is a 17th century country house set in four acres of gardens in the picturesque Durham Dales. The 39 room rural retreat boasts a spa, gourmet restaurant, tennis court and nine hole golf course set amongst ponds and streams across rolling countryside. 
Owned by the same family for four generations Headlam Hall has evolved through time whilst retaining its traditional charm and friendly atmosphere. “We are pleased to welcome Headlam Hall as part of our collection. This addition confirms our ambition to expand in the UK and Northern Europe, finding authentic properties. Headlam Hall embodies what Châteaux & Hôtels Collection stands for: charming houses with a soul”, says Xavier Alberti, CEO, Châteaux & Hôtels Collection. Note to editors: Headlam Hall costs from £117 (€165) per night based on two people sharing a double room on a B&B basis. Châteaux & Hôtels Collection, presided over by Alain Ducasse, champions independent hospitality and diversity. With an average of 29 rooms per property, the brand is all about curiosity in discovering new places with a special character. Founded in 1975, Châteaux & Hôtels Collection celebrates its 40th Anniversary in 2015 with the ambition to become a benchmark of charming hotels and gourmet restaurants in Europe. The collection has members in 16 countries, mainly France and Italy. Related articles
